data.system_settings: Samsung Galaxy J7 Prime ~ Android 7.0 Nougat
data.actual_result: It is top-left aligned and not in the middle
data.expected_result: The magnifying glass is aligned in the middle of the screen
data.short_description: The magnifying glass in the search screen you get when there are no results is top-left aligned (Note: if your screen is too small, switching to landscape also works)
data.steps_to_repro: - Click on the search icon in top right - Search for something which would give no results - Observe the magnifying glass
